meaningMnemonic: What you <radical>say</radical> to <radical>oneself</radical> (yourself), you decide to <kanji>write down</kanji>. Whether this is in the form of a journal, diary, or blog, you feel the need to <kanji>record</kanji> these important thoughts in some way.
readingMnemonic: You need to protect what you <kanji>write down</kanji> and <kanji>record</kanji> for yourself with a <reading>key</reading> (き). These are your special thoughts and feelings, you don't want anyone else to see! Lock them away with a key!
